headline: Cease-Fire Comes Apart In Libyan War Despite Talks
abstract: Fighting has started anew and foreign shipments of arms have resumed, blasting apart attempts by world leaders to broker a truce.
lead_paragraph: A cease-fire in the Libyan civil war has collapsed and foreign shipments to the combatants have resumed, shredding the work of a conference of world leaders who convened in Berlin just eight days ago.
